message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product at a price of $150. It's a great deal for its value!
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $60 for the product. What do you think?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $120? It's a fair price for the quality of this product.
Thanks for coming down, Alice, but $120 is still a bit high for me. I can go up to $70. Let me know if that works for you!
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I really want to make this work for both of us. How about we settle at $110? I believe it's a good compromise considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $110 is still beyond what I'm willing to spend. I can increase my offer to $75. Is that something you can work with?
